body: The husband deserves his own happiness but I can't entirely blame the MC. The only one that should be responsible for all this shit is the chick, I honestly feels bad for both MC and the husband for having relationship with this backstabber bitch.

I felt bad for the husband honestly since he seemed like a nice guy just had a drinking problem and a very small dick. She and the MC are childhood friends and he’s been in love with her since he was a child. So I’m happy they get together if there’s another one I hope it’s them getting married
說是純愛也不是，說是NTR也不是，反正全彩又4篇，好看就好

This is the last one.  Husband was send to mideast due to getting drunk at work. He wanna bring the girl and she agreed first. They planned the last trip and husband saw them banging. Hence the story ends with a divorce where husband left jp for work and wife stayed. 

Too many dark scenes,  color looks weird  : (
Should have been translated by now wtf
I think the next one will be the last episode. I'm too invested in the story now even though I hate NTR. Hopefully this gets translated.
